mapper.select: SELECT dbt3033."hokenRiyoshaFutangaku" FROM rgdb."DbT3017KyufujissekiKihon" AS dbt3017 INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT3033KyufujissekiShukei" AS dbt3033 ON dbt3017."hiHokenshaNo" = dbt3033."hiHokenshaNo" AND dbt3017."serviceTeikyoYM" = dbt3033."serviceTeikyoYM" WHERE dbt3017."hiHokenshaNo" = #{hokenshaNo} AND dbt3017."serviceTeikyoYM" = #{serviceTeikyoYM}
